name: Ushered
description:
DISCLAIMER! THIS GAME WAS MADE FOR A UNIVERSITY ASSIGNMENT. IF YOU PLAY IT, THANKS. FIND IT UNPLAYABLE? DON'T WORRY ABOUT IT, THE MARKERS NEVER PLAY IT.

Take the role of 13th century usher on the plains of Runnymede. Guide the eager attendees to their correct seats before the signing of the Magna Carta begins. Keep your wits about you, some of the attendees aren't welcome and you must show them the exit.

Seat as many people as possible in the time limit and the high score. Seat the VIPs and get time bonuses.


Witness a part of British history from an untold perspective and take on the most important ushering job of your life.

WASD to play

Refresh to restart

Take Black Knights to the exit
